channel.title: Quests
channel.description: Okay, I cannot seem to find this in the server so I'm hoping it's client sided....I cannot seem to figure out how to change the actual quests...Like...I can change them to whatever I want to in the quest menu...But whenever I scroll over them it still says: Doric's Quest, Black Knights' Fortress, etc. How would I go about changing THAT?...

item.title: Quests
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

Thanks…Guess I’ll post in server help then.

Read full topic

item.title: Quests
item.dc:creator: @Mod.Mike Mod.Mike
item.description:
@Mod.Mike wrote:

its not client sided or els servers that run on silabsoft would not be able to change there quests…so yeah its server sided. I would like to help you on how to add-remove quests but I remember.

+Rep if I helped

Read full topic
